basic_information.scholarship_name: Al McLaughlin Scholarship in Mass Communication
basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Al McLaughlin Scholarship

description: This scholarship was established in honor of the late Al McLaughlin, a former editor with The Oklahoman and Oklahoma Journalism Hall of Fame inductee. This scholarship recognizes Mass Communication students with preference given to Photographic Arts majors. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 3.5 GPA Mass Communication major or Photographic Arts minor Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
